net.ttddyy.dsproxy.proxy

Class ParameterSetOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.ttddyy.dsproxy.proxy.ParameterSetOperation

  • public class ParameterSetOperation
extends Object
    Keeps a method and its arguments when parameter-set-method is called.
    Since:
    1.2
    Author:
    Tadaya Tsuyukubo
    See Also:
    PreparedStatementInvocationHandler

    • Method Detail

      • getParameterNameOrIndexAsString

        public String getParameterNameOrIndexAsString()
        ParameterIndex from PreparedStatement or ParameterName from CallableStatement (first argument).

        NOTE: This method is a quick fix for logging "setNull" value. This method will be modified or removed soon.

        Returns:
        parameterIndex or parameterName as String
        Since:
        1.3.1

      • getParameterValue

        public Object getParameterValue()
        Value to display in logging from parameter-set-method.

        There is special handling for "setNull" method now.

        NOTE: This method is a quick fix for logging "setNull" value. This method will be modified or removed soon.

        Returns:
        parameterIndex or parameterName as String
        Since:
        1.3.1
